name: authorization-constraint
description: Constraints on the network origin and authentication method required for authorization.

fields.name: origin

values.name: direct-connect
values.description: Client must be directly connected to the device.

values.name: same-network
values.description: Client must be on the same network segment.

values.name: any-network
values.description: Client can be on any network.

fields.description: The required network origin of the client.

fields.name: authentication

values.name: certified
values.description: Client must be authenticated using a certified method.

values.name: secure-path
values.description: Client must be authenticated over a secure communication path.

values.name: any-method
values.description: Client can use any authentication method.

fields.description: The required authentication method for the client.
